name: Theatre Fiasco!
description:
Made by the team- Insert Joke here

Included we have both an android and Windows version of the game. 

In this clicker-based game, you must defeat bad acts represented by puppets! 

  • Noah Etabag- Staging and props
  • Rebecca Fuller- Characters
  • Louis Mayes- Programming
  • Dawid Michlski- User interface and 2D 
  • Filip Robinson - Characters
